name: Poglords
description:
Poglords is a rythmbased bunny-hopping game, select any song from your files and watch our game form a bunnyhopping track from your track!

Since this is a university project at our bachelor-degree we would like anyone willing to spend 2-3 minutes on this short questionnaire.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeCRmdGX8klDFNcSuxwssi8lUy4OWUzEvYu1HpW...

also feel free to provide feedback in the comments, any feedback is highly appreciated!

Also if you are prone to seizures, we do not advise you play this game.
